website_summaries.verdict: The Under Armour Torch might be a budget shoe but it carries with it a lot of on-court surprises. The materials that this model is made of surely do not make it look cheap. It is made of engineered mesh with foam-backed side panels. It has pretty effective traction and Micro G cushioning setups. Those who take basketball seriously will surely appreciate the goodness that this shoe offers.
pros: At least two testers are happy with the engineered mesh and foam-backed side panels in the upper of the Under Armour Torch
For something well below $100, these Under Armour basketball shoes deliver a lot
A lot of those who left comments say that the 2018 Torch model from Under Armour looks great
The full-length Micro G foam provides a lot of impact protection and court feel according to some wearers
UA Curry 6 and HOVR Havoc) reportedly offer a similar cushioning experience
The rubber outsole is very easy to wipe clean, says one wearer
According to one buyer, the UA Torch is fairly breathable
A few wearers say that these UA shoes have a fairly nice grip on the floor
cons: This summary is based on just a few reviews
points might vary when more reviews come in
The insole is decent, but it still could use some improvement according to at least one player

customer_reviews.title: Ok Shoe/Bad Fit (for me)
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with shipping envelope and box heavily damaged but shoes were in perfect condition. Very breathable and lightweight but Size runs a little large and the top of the ankle is VERY stiff and has no flexibility and immediately caused pain/discomfort. Will have to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves these. Fits well. Well made. Good grip on bottom of shoes. We usually like underarmour's products, these are no exception!
customer_reviews.author: Lor B

customer_reviews.title: Nice brand
customer_reviews.text: Very nice material, good confort, nice fit, soft to walk
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Dissatisfied just after a few wearing's, the fabric is coming apart. So expensive for such cheap quality!!
customer_reviews.author: jenny

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for running and good style!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old son loved these shoes. He said that it is a great shoe. He alao said that the shoe is good for Running and likes the style of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes...Great price
customer_reviews.text: Great fitting shoe. lots of cushion for impact. Great BBall shoe
customer_reviews.author: Juan Padilla

customer_reviews.title: No grip
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a gift , grandson needed them for basketball, no grip at all, of course he didn’t tell me right away to get a refund and get him something else
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Glaus

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed about this shoe. It came in with stains on it. I expected more from Amazon. They gave me some money back but I'm debating on whether I should just send them back
customer_reviews.author: hailstone

customer_reviews.title: Fits well! Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Fits super well for me because I’m always wearing basketball shoes from Under Armor!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Wu

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Not a great shoe. The latches is to short and seems smaller than a normal size
customer_reviews.author: Adriaan Bresler

customer_reviews.title: Fit the bill
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were just what I expected and seem to be great BB shoes
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe at a good price!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were purchased for my 11 year old and he loves them. He plays basketball several times a week and really enjoys the comfort and performance.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Fox

customer_reviews.title: Best value in shoes
customer_reviews.text: They came quickly and fit great and at great price
customer_reviews.author: S. Skipper

customer_reviews.title: There' no additional strings
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Design, size, and colors are so satisfying.
customer_reviews.author: Seondae Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is comfortable and I feel like it has good ankle support
customer_reviews.author: Michael Small

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit and price
customer_reviews.text: As a recreational hoops player, I appreciate the quality of these shoes without having to pawn my grandma's silverware to afford them. So far, I've enjoyed embarrassing my friends on the court, though I'm not sure I can attribute it to the shoes. I lucked out and got them for about $35; a no-brainer in my book (see chapter 6, page 95 - deals you shouldn't pass up.)
customer_reviews.author: Dad, the Man.

customer_reviews.title: Shoe Lace Grommet Ripped
customer_reviews.text: After only a few uses the shoe lace grommet that holds the shoe lace ripped. These shoes were hard to tie tight because after tightening them by the time I tied the shoe the laces loosened up. The lace grommet ripping only made it worse. These shoes also don't seem to breath very well. Fit was good and floor traction was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Awesome look. Some rubbing, slipping of heel.
customer_reviews.text: Had rubbing on outside of pad, felt like heels were slipping out regardless of how I tied them. Even went true to size. Usually wear 13, actually 12.5. Ordered 12.5. Looks great otherwise, hoping they’ll break in.
customer_reviews.author: Fender6201

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these basketball shoes for my son (almost 13 years old) to wear during a week long basketball camp because we realized his other shoes had gotten too small. We didn't have much time to shop around. We found these online and they were a Prime item, even better so they would arrive in 2 days. He loves these shoes. They fit well and were a great price since his feet are growing so quickly. They are comfortable with a lot of cushioning. He loves them so much we just ordered another pair in a different color!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri M. Creedon

customer_reviews.title: Not for the Flat Footed
customer_reviews.text: I'm flat footed. Shoe is not that comfy when it comes to running or walking for extended periods. The only real good thing that came out of me buying this shoe is that it matches one of my outfits. This shoe became a part of my going out wardrobe instead of workout wardrobe. You win some and you lose some.
customer_reviews.author: Wyntonio Number9

customer_reviews.title: An awesome shoes
customer_reviews.text: They where bought as a gift and they v are very well like awesome shoes
customer_reviews.author: angie b.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this shoe, fit to the true size and good grip
customer_reviews.author: Dark Coffee

customer_reviews.title: This is a great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit with solid construction. I will buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Ben D

customer_reviews.title: Bought for Twins
customer_reviews.text: They look better than the picture, bought for sons may buy me a pair of this one. Has a back to the future feel.
customer_reviews.author: je

customer_reviews.title: Basketball shoes
customer_reviews.text: I loved it! My nephew will loved it for his basketball game.
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie

customer_reviews.title: Might be a bit narrow
customer_reviews.text: I like everything except the width is a little narrow
customer_reviews.author: Blaze B.

customer_reviews.title: Look good, comfortable, but not best quality rubber
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son to play basketball in. The soles were peeling off after a couple of weeks of practice only 3x a week. Shoes were on gym floor only.
customer_reviews.author: KaceyBlunkPhotography

customer_reviews.title: It's a wrong sized shoe for me
customer_reviews.text: If you received the returned item please just change it to size 45.5 and send it back to me. I just got the wrong size. I am certified with the quality of the product. So there's no need to refund me.
customer_reviews.author: Taidor Lam Rut

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, okay traction
customer_reviews.text: Fits great considering I have wide feet and no break in time needed. Personally I feel like traction could've been better because I slipped several times playing. I always play on outdoor courts just fyi.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great value and great support for my ankles during basketball!
customer_reviews.author: Jayse Thaxton

customer_reviews.title: No Grip!
customer_reviews.text: No grip! This is supposed to be a basketball shoe and my son was sliding all over the court!
customer_reviews.author: LaKisha

customer_reviews.title: Too big a shoe
customer_reviews.text: It's way too big. My size is 9.5 and this was a 12.
customer_reviews.author: timothy k. machira

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Shoe fits as expected,got several compliment, great buy and good price.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Davis

customer_reviews.title: GET THESE NOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: My friend had been looking for a new pair of basketball shoes, so when these became available I couldn't wait to send them to him to get his thoughts and he was ELATED. I quote: "The grip on the sole is TOP NOTCH. Little tight on the toes but to be expected from new shoes. Overall solid shoe. Not flashy, but good!" So there you have it again, an excellent quality shoe at LEAST a hundred dollars cheaper than popular basketball shoes by more expensive brands. And Amazon has slashed the price down even more, so you REALLY can't go wrong here!
customer_reviews.author: NaughtiLiterati

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: A nice fit for my feet. I have rather wide feet​ and it is a bit forgiving. It is well-made and very light on your feet. The style is simple with an orange stripe in the middle for contrast. I play basketball and it is comfortable to wear maneuvering all over the court.
customer_reviews.author: Nuk

customer_reviews.title: Under Armour quality
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, in today’s fashion, this shoe is a great choice for athletic use as well as just lookin’ good while hangin’ with your buds. Under Armour’s reputation for high quality is well represented in these shoes. They’re really well made, and robust enough to stand up to a lot of strenuous use. Fit, finish, and detailing were all top-notch.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Baker

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Under Armour Men's Torch Basketball Shoe is a fairly good athletic shoe. My husband is wearing these for casual wear but not for playing sports. He really likes them. He says they fit well, and are comfortable. He likes the style and the high cut. They are well made and look stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Maines, best-selling, award-winning author, actor, and editor

customer_reviews.title: Fits a bit small, lightweight, comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight - just 13 oz each show, with grippy soles. Comfortable, but fit about 1/2 a size too small. The front and uppers have some stretch. The width is right on. Great cushioning for bball or jogging.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C. Drew

customer_reviews.title: Good basketball shoe
customer_reviews.text: Good, comfortable basketball shoe. Something you can actually play in. Nice ankle support and good traction. Fits true to size. Very breathable, which is a necessity.
customer_reviews.author: MyPenName

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: Like the way this shoe fits. Very comfortable. Really cool style as well. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Very nice! I would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fast and arrived exactly as described. Nice looking shoe, my son will be thrilled on Christmas morning!
customer_reviews.author: MDP

customer_reviews.title: Under armor
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit very comfortable. Size 12 was right on for me. Love these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Coppeto

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's Ua Torch Basketball Shoes
feature_bullets: Engineered mesh upper provides zonal breathability and support
Air mesh tongue for added breathability and comfort on the top of the foot
Webbed lacing system for a customized midfoot lockdown fit
Die-cut EVA sockliner provides underfoot cushioning and support
Full-length Micro G foam midsole for explosive energy return
Rubber outsole uses herringbone traction pattern to provide maximum floor control and grip
